timeline.bodyText: when you say we do this quite frequently what does this mean ?
timeline.author: normanmaurer

replies.bodyText: I actually mean, we are converting IPv4Address into Integer quite often like in PR #10492 or #10498. In PCapWriter, we convert IPv4Address to Integer to write into Pcap file and in Binary search one, we need Integer Ip address not InetAddress. Even in unit tests. So it might be a good idea to push that code into NetUtils instead of copy-pasting every time.
replies.author: hyperxpro
